Title: Stag
Writer: Bill Dubuque (created by), Ryan Farley, Mark Williams (created by), Ning Zhou (staff writer)
Actors: Jason Bateman, Laura Linney, Sofia Hublitz, Skylar Gaertner
Plot: The FBI sends out a second lure. Charlotte slips up while chatting with Wyatt. The Byrdes grow wary of Rachel, who deflects suspicion onto someone else.
